meanings.definition: A small rounded particle consisting of concentric layers of calcium carbonate deposited around a nucleus.
meanings.sent1: The oolith was found in the sedimentary rock.
meanings.sent2: The beach was covered in tiny ooliths.
meanings.sent3: The oolith rolled down the hill, gathering speed.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace shimmered like a string of ooliths.
meanings.sent5: The scientist studied the intricate layers of the oolith under a microscope.
